title: Ep 77: How to Be a Hostess with Laura Slatkin of Nest Fragrances
itunes:title: Ep 77: How to Be a Hostess with Laura Slatkin of Nest Fragrances
itunes:subtitle: Laura Slatkin, founder of Nest Fragrances, indulges us in our favorite topic: everything candles and fragrance! A legendary party-thrower, she also explains what scents to burn at your next get-together, the food people can't refuse, and how to be...
description:
Laura Slatkin, founder of Nest Fragrances, indulges us in our favorite topic: everything candles and fragrance! A legendary party-thrower, she also explains what scents to burn at your next get-together, the food people can't refuse, and how to be a good guest. Before that: Our Emmy beauty breakdown; Jess's “no-eyeliner” eyeliner trick; and dealing with acne scars.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
